name: Instructions: Electroculus Resonance Stone
desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Electroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Electroculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Electroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Electroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Electroculi.

customize.name: Electroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc:
A stone that can be used in Inazuma to search for nearby Electroculi.
This strange device can resonate with Electro Statues of The Seven. Due to this trait, it can detect the presence of Electroculi.
Across the span of endless years, even the most majestic cities and sculptures would be worn down by wind and rain, and even the power of Statues of The Seven would gradually dissipate. But this faded strength would coalesce once more into the Oculi, which call out wordlessly to their Statues.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Naku Weed
customize.desc: Even on windless days, this plant will tremble lightly amid the cries of thunder. The parts of it that resemble petals are in fact extensions of the leaves meant to protect the fragile flower.

customize.name: Sakura Bloom
customize.desc: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.

customize.name: Amethyst Lump
customize.desc: An uncut crystal that can only be found in Inazuma. Some professional craftsmanship will bring out its true value.

customize.name: Instructions: Anemoculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making an Anemoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Anemoculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Geoculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Geoculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to towards Geoculi.

customize.name: Instructions: Dendroculus Resonance Stone
customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Dendroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Dendroculi.

customize.desc: Detailed step-by-step instructions for making a Hydroculus Resonance Stone. Master them and you will be able to create a tool to guide you to Hydroculi.
